title: Golem (disambiguation)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Golem is a magical being created for a specific purpose. They are generally made out of special clay, and are given instructions through special scrolls placed in their heads. In RuneScape, the term "golem" may refer to:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Golem

A Golem is a magical being created for a specific purpose. They are generally made out of special clay, and are given instructions through special scrolls placed in their heads. In RuneScape, the term "golem" may refer to:

Contents

  • 1 Quests
  • 2 NPCs
  • 3 Scenery
  • 4 Other

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • The Golem, a quest centred around a golem and the desert city of Uzer

NPCs[edit | edit source]

  • Clay golem, the main NPC of The Golem
  • The golems found in the Ruins of Camdozaal:
    • Flawed Golem, not associated to any runes
    • Mind Golem, associated to Mind runes and the Mind Altar
    • Body Golem, associated to Body runes and the Body Altar
    • Chaos Golem, associated to Chaos runes and the Chaos Altar
  • The golem guards from the Spirits of the Elid quest:
    • White golem, weak to Stab attacks
    • Black golem, weak to Crush attacks
    • Grey golem, weak to Slash attacks
  • The golem that is occasionally summoned by Zalcano
  • Rock golem, a retired mining random event that attacked players
  • Rock golem, a skilling pet
  • Entrance Guardian, a rune essence golem who welcomes players at the Mage Training Arena
  • Runite Golem, a monster found in the Resource Area, east of the Deserted Keep
  • TzHaar, a race of golem-like creatures that inhabit Mor Ul Rek

Scenery[edit | edit source]

  • Golem arm
  • Golem body
  • Golem foot
  • Golem head
  • Golem rubble

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Golem program, a quest item used in The Golem
  • The Golem, a music track
  • The Golem NPC attribute, an attribute added to some golem-like monsters to make them weak to the barronite mace.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{External|rs=Golem}}
A '''Golem''' is a magical being created for a specific purpose. They are generally made out of special clay, and are given instructions through special scrolls placed in their heads. In ''[[RuneScape]]'', the term "golem" may refer to:

{{ToC|align=right|width=120px}}

===Quests===
*[[The Golem]], a [[quest]] centred around a golem and the desert city of [[Uzer]]

===NPCs===
*[[Clay golem]], the main [[NPC]] of [[The Golem]]
*The [[Golem (Ruins of Camdozaal)|golems]] found in the [[Ruins of Camdozaal]]:
**[[Flawed Golem]], not associated to any runes
**[[Mind Golem]], associated to [[Mind runes]] and the [[Mind Altar]]
**[[Body Golem]], associated to [[Body runes]] and the [[Body Altar]]
**[[Chaos Golem]], associated to [[Chaos runes]] and the [[Chaos Altar]]
*The golem guards from the [[Spirits of the Elid]] quest:
**[[White golem]], weak to [[Stab attacks]]
**[[Black golem]], weak to [[Crush attacks]]
**[[Grey golem]], weak to [[Slash attacks]]
*The [[golem]] that is occasionally summoned by [[Zalcano]]
*[[Rock golem (monster)|Rock golem]], a retired [[mining]] [[random event]] that attacked players
*[[Rock golem]], a [[skilling pet]]
*[[Entrance Guardian]], a rune essence golem who welcomes players at the [[Mage Training Arena]]
*[[Runite Golem]], a monster found in the [[Resource Area]], east of the [[Deserted Keep]]
*[[TzHaar]], a [[race]] of golem-like creatures that inhabit [[Mor Ul Rek]]

===Scenery===
*[[Golem arm]]
*[[Golem body]]
*[[Golem foot]]
*[[Golem head]]
*[[Golem rubble]]

===Other===
*[[Golem program]], a quest item used in [[The Golem]]
*[[The Golem (music track)|The Golem]], a music track
*The [[Golem (attribute)|Golem NPC attribute]], an attribute added to some golem-like monsters to make them weak to the [[barronite mace]].

{{Disambig}}
